documents.document: Nothing like whipping out your countdown onecard to save 40 cents when you are spending $200

I'm hiding in the bedroom because my boyfriend is taking a saw to our brand new kitchen and I can't cope with the stress 😱😰😬
A card and collection has come around for a team member that's leaving. 8 people have signed the card, 0 have given money.
@pinkdeedle pretty sure PBT stands for Probabaly Broken in Transit
Boyfriend has spent an hour googling to prove me wrong. Sadly he has to admit defeat.
Someone changed the sound my indicators make and now it sounds like I'm driving a demented robot
I wonder what toad the wet sprocket are up to 🤔
I probabaly shouldn't laugh but the toilet at the new house blew away
When you run out of medication on a public holiday 😳

When you drop a limited edition car off at the panel beaters and it comes back normal edition coz they used the wrong parts 😭😭😭😭😭

Please let my car be ready tomorrow, I'm not mentally prepared for any more vitzing
Sometimes life is weird. If I hadn't had someone crash into my car someone I know wouldn't have bought a house today
Just ordered a Roomba, this is probably the most exciting thing that has ever happened in my life
Why do all @Bunnings check out people all disappear when they make the get out of the store announcement 🤔😬😩
I have a Toyota vitz to drive while my car is being fixed. I am so sad about this
I thought I was going to the hospital for a pretty routine check up. They have sent me anaesthetic & post op care info 🤔😱😬
Really regretting putting the heater back in storage ⛄️⛄️⛄️⛄️⛄️
@USOuljah had a letter addressed to a Sonotorious in my Po box once. I was just like oh... 😬
Trying to pick service providers for the new house is like trying to pick from 5 or 6 satans, I'm just trying to work out the least evil
I love the warehouse. Mmmmm fingernails https://t.co/Ht8NPMsHJi
Why is ice cream sold in litres when it isn't a liquid?

In bunnings, there is a lady in a convertible Audi TT trying to fit in pieces of 6m long wood in her car

My boyfriend and 85 million year old great aunt are discussing her going in the racecar. I can't tell if they are joking or serious
Turns out when you order a flat pack kitchen you get literally 600 pieces and zero instructions
Next house will have a Christmas tree cupboard in the lounge so I can pull it in & out of the cupboard fully assembled & decorated as needed
Dear three year old. I could be wrong, but I doubt the theme song you are singing is for a tv show called Whore Patrol
@danforpd unsure. The burglar alarm does as they set it without leaving us instructions on how to turn it off 🙄
Used the garage door opener for the first time at the new house. Smoke started pouring out and the plastic melted a bit #success
Waiting for the new kitchen to arrive, I feel like something exciting is about to happen, but actually it's just a lot of lifting
Practicing my surprised/excited face for when I open up on of those giant vag looking loungers on Christmas morning
There are so many flashy warning lights due to all the broken stuff on my car it's like driving around in my own personal annoying disco
I appreciate the fact someone at work has gone to the trouble of decorating the toilets for Christmas
When your 4 month old car gets the shit smashed out of it 😱😭
Yus! So excited I had to open it in the car! He shall be added to my mr potato head collection! Good work! Thank yo… https://t.co/7OqzsSiAxM

@pinkdeedle ohhhh I hope it's a mini one

My #nzsecretsanta hasn't even left Auckland yet 😭 and my giftee hasn't received theirs yet 😭😭
I have three Christmas presents still to arrive by post. The stress 😰
My #nzsecretsanta didn't arrive & my giftee hasnt tweeted for days so I am assuming they are dead & I won't even get to see their reaction 😭
Just spent a stupid amount of money on two Halloween themed noggin bops. What am I even doing? 🎃
There is something in my Po box!! Hurry up morning tea so I can go and rescue it 😬 🎅🏼 #nzsecretsanta
@ThievinBandito 🤔 I think you're secretly trying to kill me. I'm on to you!
I won 150 candy canes! Yay diabetes! Oh wait, too late 😭
@pinkdeedle shit, I would almost be a millionaire if I sold off my 5th form maths book page by page 😂
🤢 finally!
Aren't Swarovski crystals just glass? What am I missing that makes them so special?
@MattyRulz666 no, mostly because I read the news online like a normal person
Why does Connor McGregor look like a dwarf and I look like a giant, yet we are the same height?
Divided up my office's 2 years worth of lotto winnings. We got $24 each 😩😭
I hope the lady that just drove up and took photos of our house enjoys the waving and face pulling we did
@pinkdeedle yep. I don't even want to know the logistics of it. Imagine a paper cut on your bum

I have enough flybuys to get 1 person to LA and back. I'm sure Danny will be totally cool with staying home

Overheard someone telling the wardrobe guy a display wall for my shoes isn't really a necessity. INCORRECT!
